original_text: “For it will be like a man going on a journey, who called his servants and entrusted to them his property.
korean_text: 또 어떤 사람이 타국에 갈 때 그 종들을 불러 자기 소유를 맡김과 같으니

sentences.original_text: For it will be like a man going on a journey
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 먼 길을 떠나는 어떤 사람과 같을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: and entrusted to them his property.
